attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Half term holidays are an outdated institution and an inconvenience for many families. Families with single parents or two working parents can only manage childcare needs by taking annual leave or making alternative childcare arrangements. As the profile of the typical family shifts to more single parent or two working parent families the institution of half term holidays become more of an inconvenience.
